title: The Castle's Unblinking Eye
story: An unnerving stillness descends, as if the castle itself holds its breath, watching your every move. Fair weather offers no reprieve from this oppressive, unseen scrutiny.
effect: While this card is active, whenever a hero performs a Combat action or a Memory Search action, they must immediately lose 1 Sanity. Furthermore, if Mina Harker performs a Memory Search action, she loses an additional 1 Health.
